data: {"generalSituation":"Under the influence of a fresh to strong northeast monsoon, the weather will be cool in the morning with sunny intervals during the day over the coast of southern China on the second and third days of Lunar New Year. With the monsoon moderating gradually, it will be warm during the day over Guangdong in the latter part of this week and over the weekend. An easterly airstream is expected to affect the coast of southern China early next week. It will be cloudier over the region.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260218","week":"Wednesday","forecastWind":"East to northeast force 4 to 5.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy. Cool in the morning.
